name: Blade Instructor
oracle_text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."

name: Bounty Agent
oracle_text: Vigilance
{T}, Sacrifice Bounty Agent: Destroy target legendary permanent that's an artifact, creature, or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Lately I've seen the biggest bounties of my career—and for the biggest names."

name: Candlelight Vigil
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has vigilance.
flavor_text: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the Conclave can.

name: Citywide Bust
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Collar the Culprit
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Conclave Tribunal
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

name: Crush Contraband
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Exile target artifact.
• Exile target enchantment.
flavor_text: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

name: Dawn of Hope
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor_text:
"To wage war, secure peace within yourself."
—Emmara

name: Demotion
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: There's no greater honor than joining your chosen guild, and no greater shame than failing it.

name: Divine Visitation
oracle_text: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.
flavor_text: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.

name: Flight of Equenauts
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
flavor_text: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."

name: Gird for Battle
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
flavor_text:
"You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart."
—Aurelia

name: Haazda Marshal
oracle_text: Whenever Haazda Marshal and at least two other creatures attack, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor_text: Ravnica's convoluted power structure often boils down to who can muster the most swords on a given block.

name: Healer's Hawk
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
flavor_text: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

name: Hunted Witness
oracle_text: When Hunted Witness dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor_text: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals—but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

name: Inspiring Unicorn
oracle_text: Whenever Inspiring Unicorn attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

name: Intrusive Packbeast
oracle_text: Vigilance
When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.
flavor_text: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

name: Ledev Guardian
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
flavor_text: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."

name: Light of the Legion
oracle_text: Flying
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
When Light of the Legion dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each white creature you control.

name: Loxodon Restorer
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Loxodon Restorer enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

name: Luminous Bonds
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: "Article 5.8.2. Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate." —Azorius Arrester Procedure, Appendix B

name: Parhelion Patrol
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."

name: Righteous Blow
oracle_text: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserve. On this we agree."
—Tajic

name: Roc Charger
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Roc Charger attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Rocs' innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.

name: Skyline Scout
oracle_text: Whenever Skyline Scout attacks, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, ‘You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

name: Sunhome Stalwart
oracle_text: First strike
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"

name: Sworn Companions
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
flavor_text:
"The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."
—Karlov of the Ghost Council

name: Take Heart
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature you control.
flavor_text: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

name: Tenth District Guard
oracle_text: When Tenth District Guard enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."

name: Venerated Loxodon
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Venerated Loxodon enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that convoked it.

name: Capture Sphere
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Chemister's Insight
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor_text: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."

name: Citywatch Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
When Citywatch Sphinx dies, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.

name: Dazzling Lights
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Devious Cover-Up
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of its disposal.

name: Dimir Informant
oracle_text: When Dimir Informant enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.

name: Disdainful Stroke
oracle_text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "Laws apply only to those who lack the vision to see past them."

name: Dream Eater
oracle_text: Flash
Flying

When Dream Eater enters the battlefield, surveil 4. When you do, you may return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. (To surveil 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Drowned Secrets
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: Beneath Ravnica's streets runs a layer of tunnels, then caverns and waterways, then terrors and nightmares.

name: Enhanced Surveillance
oracle_text: You may look at an additional two cards each time you surveil.
Exile Enhanced Surveillance: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text:
"Who are the agents of the Dimir? No one and everyone."
—Lazav

name: Guild Summit
oracle_text: When Guild Summit enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped Gates you control. Draw a card for each Gate tapped this way.
Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
flavor_text: In a climate of suspicion, Isperia gathered the guilds to propose a radical idea: cooperation.

name: Leapfrog
oracle_text: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor_text:
"Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

name: Maximize Altitude
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Mission Briefing
oracle_text: Surveil 2, then choose an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Murmuring Mystic
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird Illusion creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.

name: Muse Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When Muse Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed—except among the drakes.

name: Narcomoeba
oracle_text: Flying
When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"What bait do you cast to catch a dream?"
—Ravnican riddle

name: Nightveil Sprite
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Nightveil Sprite attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in."
—Minosz, Orzhov chief of security

name: Omnispell Adept
oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}: You may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.

name: Passwall Adept
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

name: Quasiduplicate
oracle_text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor_text: "My greatest creation—me!"

name: Radical Idea
oracle_text: Draw a card.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor_text: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

name: Selective Snare
oracle_text: Return X target creatures of the creature type of your choice to their owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"How thoughtful of the Legion to train its soldiers to fit our spell's specifications."
—Nefara, Dimir agent

name: Sinister Sabotage
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds."
—Lazav

name: Thoughtbound Phantasm
oracle_text: Defender
Whenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on Thoughtbound Phantasm.
As long as Thoughtbound Phantasm has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

name: Unexplained Disappearance
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.

name: Vedalken Mesmerist
oracle_text: Whenever Vedalken Mesmerist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

name: Wall of Mist
oracle_text: Defender
flavor_text: Fog haunts the streets, rendering the familiar as otherworldly, changing neighbors into shadows, and muffling cries for help.

name: Watcher in the Mist
oracle_text: Flying

When Watcher in the Mist enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Wishcoin Crab
flavor_text:
"What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."
—Omik, superintendent of waterworks

name: Barrier of Bones
oracle_text: Defender
When Barrier of Bones enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The Dimir rarely make statements, but when they do, the message is clear.

name: Bartizan Bats
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."
—Izoni

name: Blood Operative
oracle_text: Lifelink
When Blood Operative enters the battlefield, you may exile target card from a graveyard.
Whenever you surveil, if Blood Operative is in your graveyard, you may pay 3 life. If you do, return Blood Operative to your hand.

name: Burglar Rat
oracle_text: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.

name: Creeping Chill
oracle_text: Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.
When Creeping Chill is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.

name: Dead Weight
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor_text: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.

name: Deadly Visit
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Doom Whisperer
oracle_text: Flying, trample
Pay 2 life: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.

name: Douser of Lights
flavor_text: The party of Rakdos revelers cackled and capered as the thing approached. It hissed, and they jabbed their torches at it, giggling when it recoiled. Then, one by one, the torches went out—and the screaming began.

name: Gruesome Menagerie
oracle_text: Choose a creature card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Variety is also the spice of death."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Hired Poisoner
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text: "They don't even feel the cut. I'm ordering a drink in a nearby tavern before anyone notices something's wrong."

name: Kraul Swarm
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{B}, Discard a creature card: Return Kraul Swarm from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The hive has a long memory. It knows how every member ever died, and to whom it owes the grudge.

name: Lotleth Giant
oracle_text: Undergrowth — When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Mausoleum Secrets
oracle_text: Undergrowth — Search your library for a black card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Mephitic Vapors
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

name: Midnight Reaper
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
flavor_text: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

name: Moodmark Painter
oracle_text: Undergrowth — When Moodmark Painter enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Necrotic Wound
oracle_text: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: The assassins of the Ochran distill toxins from the remains of their previous victims.

name: Never Happened
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it.
flavor_text: Dimir assassins have the precision to slay a single memory.

name: Pilfering Imp
oracle_text: Flying

{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Pilfering Imp: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Plaguecrafter
oracle_text: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.
flavor_text: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."

name: Price of Fame
oracle_text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a legendary creature.
Destroy target creature.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Ritual of Soot
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.
flavor_text: Only the patrol's armor was found, so tainted with the acrid smell of sudden death that it could never be worn again.

name: Severed Strands
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."

name: Spinal Centipede
oracle_text: When Spinal Centipede dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: The Golgari adorn themselves with the exoskeletons of iridescent insects. It's only fair the insects do likewise.

name: Undercity Necrolisk
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Undercity Necrolisk. It gains menace until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: In its territory, living is an affront.

name: Veiled Shade
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Veiled Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I sang songs of sorrow for my lost love. Imagine my horror when, one night, they were answered."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Vicious Rumors
oracle_text: Vicious Rumors deals 1 damage to each opponent. Each opponent discards a card, then puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. You gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"The alliances were already frayed. All we do is find the loose threads and pluck."
—Lazav

name: Whispering Snitch
oracle_text: Whenever you surveil for the first time each turn, Whispering Snitch deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Sure, I hear things. I hear plenty. But how am I to talk with this parched throat?"

name: Arclight Phoenix
oracle_text: Flying, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Some storms never blow over.

name: Barging Sergeant
oracle_text: Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."

name: Book Devourer
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Book Devourer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.
flavor_text: "Not my first edition of The Advokist and the Urchin!"

name: Command the Storm
oracle_text: Command the Storm deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: In the wake of Niv-Mizzet's disappearance, Ral found himself leading the guild. He had dreamed of this day, but couldn't help feeling like a pawn in someone else's game.

name: Cosmotronic Wave
oracle_text: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

name: Direct Current
oracle_text: Direct Current deals 2 damage to any target.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Electrostatic Field
oracle_text: Defender
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Electrostatic Field deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text:
"It's both an ingress-denial mechanism and an attractive hallway light!"
—Daxiver, Izzet electromancer

name: Erratic Cyclops
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Erratic Cyclops gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text:
"The League accepts no responsibility for former members and the damage they may cause."
—Maree, Izzet chamberlain

name: Experimental Frenzy
oracle_text: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play the top card of your library.
You can't play cards from your hand.
{3}{R}: Destroy Experimental Frenzy.
flavor_text: Turns out coffee is the weird aunt of invention.

name: Fearless Halberdier
flavor_text: "I spent some time in the Legion, but I'm done taking orders all day."

name: Fire Urchin
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Fire Urchin gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Rain runoff in the Smelting District is known to spontaneously burst into flame.

name: Goblin Banneret
oracle_text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
{1}{R}: Goblin Banneret gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Boros banner stands tall even if its bearer doesn't.

name: Goblin Cratermaker
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Goblin Cratermaker: Choose one —
• Goblin Cratermaker deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target colorless nonland permanent.

name: Goblin Locksmith
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Locksmith attacks, creatures with defender can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"He's got more finesse than most goblins. He smashes windows with his fist rather than his forehead."
—Arrester Polgar

name: Gravitic Punch
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Hellkite Whelp
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Hellkite Whelp attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.
flavor_text:
"They play by spitting fire at each other. Don't be offended if one gives you a love-scorch."
—Esfir, Rakdos dragon wrangler

name: Inescapable Blaze
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Inescapable Blaze deals 6 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The Izzet are blamed for every little disaster, which is unfair because we only cause most of them."
—Mizzix of the Izmagnus

name: Lava Coil
oracle_text: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
"Commander, we caught the Dimir spy and took her ashes into custody."
—Kramm, Wojek security officer

name: Legion Warboss
oracle_text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn and attacks this combat if able.

name: Maniacal Rage
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor_text:
"They tell us the wilds are ours, then they brick them over. They can lie to our faces but not to our fists."
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

name: Maximize Velocity
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Ornery Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: "Nobody ever listens to my complaints! Not even when I use the listening stick."

name: Risk Factor
oracle_text: Target opponent may have Risk Factor deal 4 damage to them. If that player doesn't, you draw three cards.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Rubblebelt Boar
oracle_text: When Rubblebelt Boar enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some Gruul druids believe that boars are spawn of the great Ilharg, the mighty Raze-Boar who will one day rise and level the city.

name: Runaway Steam-Kin
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a red spell, if Runaway Steam-Kin has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on Runaway Steam-Kin.
Remove three +1/+1 counters from Runaway Steam-Kin: Add {R}{R}{R}.

name: Smelt-Ward Minotaur

name: Find (Find/Finality)
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Finality (Find/Finality)
oracle_text: You may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control. Then all creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

name: Flower (Flower/Flourish)
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Flourish (Flower/Flourish)
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Integrity (Integrity/Intervention)
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Intervention (Integrity/Intervention)
oracle_text: Intervention deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

name: Invert (Invert/Invent)
oracle_text: Switch the power and toughness of each of up to two target creatures until end of turn.

name: Invent (Invert/Invent)
oracle_text: Search your library for an instant card and/or a sorcery card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Response (Response/Resurgence)
oracle_text: Response deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Resurgence (Response/Resurgence)
oracle_text: Creatures you control gain first strike and vigilance until end of turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

name: Status (Status/Statue)
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Statue (Status/Statue)
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment.

name: Boros Locket

—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

{X}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Chamber Sentry: It deals X damage to any target.

oracle_text: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

oracle_text: Flying

oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each Gate you control and has vigilance and menace. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
